LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_ComplexityLimit.desc: How much complexity this unit is able to handle without exceeding standard operating limits or without complexity offsetting.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_SkillLimit.label: skill capacity
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Artificial_SkillLimit.descripti: The maximum skill level this unit may have in any particular field, offset by inherent skills.
